newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Barco buys U.S. Electronic Image Systems.
newsitem.headline: Barco buys U.S. Electronic Image Systems.

text.p: Belgian electronics company Barco NV said on Monday it had acquired 100 percent of privately-held U.S. projector maker Electronic Image Systems Inc (EIS) for an undisclosed amount.
EIS makes specialised image projection systems used in flight simulators. The company had sales in 1996 of around $10 million, Barco said.
Barco business development manager Karl Peters said the final acquisition price was to be linked to EIS's revenues and profitability over the next two years.
EIS's profitability had been "satisfactory" during the last few years, Barco said in a statement.
Barco said it would create a new division within its Barco Projection Systems business unit to oversee the sale of EIS projectors and exploitation of the projector technology.
Barco said the same technology could also be applied to planetariums and other multimedia applications which required a very bright image.
